The revelation that Catherine, the Princess of Wales, has cancer prompted a backlash over the torrent of lurid social media speculation around her health, including by those positing she was dead. But the endless churn of conspiracy theories has not stopped‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/6YDiASUfCY
